attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick of the media and political bias against Israel .  Where is this coming from ?  Hamas is a terrorist organisation which has pledged not to seek peace with Israel !  I mean since when do we support Islamic terorist organisations over western styled democracies ?  Is this left wing madness gone insane ?

rejection.details: You must include a request for the Government to take action through, for example, a new or altered policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
